snippet: The Metropolitan Museum of Art is beginning MetPublications, an online resource that will allow users to search more than 600 catalogs, journals and bulletins.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; Metropolitan Museum of Art is beginning online resource MetPublications; sculptures of sheep, including an elusive black version, from artist Francois-Xavier Lalanne, is being sold at Christie's during its important New York evening sale of postwar and contemporary art; traveling exhibition of the latest works by artist David Hockney will be on view at San Francisco's de Young Museum in 2013.
lead_paragraph: The Metropolitan Museum of Art is beginning MetPublications, an online resource that will allow users to search more than 600 catalogs, journals and bulletins.

headline.seo: The Met’s Exhibition Catalogs Are Revived for a Digital Life
headline.main: Met’s Exhibition Catalogs Revived for a Digital Life
headline.print_headline:
Met’s Exhibition Catalogs
Revived for a Digital Life
